project_descr: Water Governance Programme for Arab States (WGP-AS)

outputs.output_descr: The goal of the Water Governance Programme for Arab States is to improve the effective use and management of scarce water resources in Arab countries. It aims at supporting the achievements of MDG 7, particularly improved water supply and sanitation, and will align with the priorities on long term sustainability in regards to water that are currently being identified in the development of the SDGs. In promoting an integrated approach to water resources management, the WGP-AS is envisaged to act as a catalyst for effective water governance through the provision of technical and policy support,

project_title: water governance programme for arab states
